message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $115. It's a great deal, as you know its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay a premium for a good product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $100 simply doesn't cover my costs. I'm willing to compromise a bit.  How about we meet in the middle at $107.50?  This way we both get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $105? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to stay within my limits.
